metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for corporate gathering, including gluten-free and vegan options.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Crispy falafel made from ground chickpeas and herbs, served with a tahini-yogurt sauce. Ensure a gluten-free recipe by using chickpea flour and frying in fresh oil.
Classic French ratatouille with eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and tomatoes. Can be served warm or at room temperature, suitable for vegan diets.
Hearty red lentil soup with carrots, celery, and spinach, seasoned with cumin and coriander. A naturally gluten-free and vegan option.
Aromatic vegetable tagine with a blend of Moroccan spices, chickpeas, and various seasonal vegetables. Serve with couscous or quinoa for a complete meal.
Creamy mushroom risotto made with Arborio rice, wild mushrooms, and vegetable broth. Ensure vegan by using plant-based butter and nutritional yeast instead of cheese.
